resources.string: Welcome to BMI Calculator, your personal tool for tracking your Body Mass Index (BMI) and monitoring your health.
A BMI below 18.5 is in the underweight category. Consider consulting with a healthcare provider about healthy weight gain strategies.
A BMI of 18.5 - 24.9 is in the normal weight category. Keep up the good work with your healthy lifestyle!
A BMI of 25.0 - 29.9 is in the overweight category for adults of your height. Choose healthier foods and do more regular physical activities to reduce the risks.
A BMI of 30.0 or higher is in the obese category. Consider consulting with a healthcare provider about weight management strategies.
